channel.title: List of NFTs on Radix DLT
channel.description:
# Summary list of NFTs on the Radix Ledger
![image|412x129](upload://69Mqb3xhE12nm9d5KtpdANnlHGQ.png)
|**NFT Preview**|**Name**|**Brief description**|**Price**| |-|-|-|-| |[![Sample\|500x500, 50%](upload://Lp6uuc2jSEgYMGylOvp8Tiz53z.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/nerdsrepublic/252/2)|[**NerdsRepublic**](https://radixtalk.com/t/nerdsrepublic/252/2)|Nerds Republic is the first collection of 10,000 unique characters living on the Radix DLT.|150 XRD| |[![image\|320x320, 78%](upload://3MYYGSUlDexZzJY5i6gAoeI2Bkt.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/abandoned-scorpions/253/2)|[**Abandoned Scorpions**](https://radixtalk.com/t/abandoned-scorpions/253/2)|A collection of 10,000 unique pixelart scorpions living on the Radix DLT.|20 XRD| |[![image\|500x500, 50%](upload://hB51avWxH9oU0qWKqFq1zX3wBga.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/hoard-token/254/2)|[**HOARD**](https://radixtalk.com/t/hoard-token/254/2)|The collection consists of 10,000 unique Hoard Coins influenced by several historical eras.|25 XRD| |[![image\|250x250](upload://u0xJUG1ZnmmxOMe8Br4LjBNxxWf.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/artistizen/255)|[**Artistizen**](https://radixtalk.com/t/artistizen/255)|25 Radix Team Tributjects in 100 sets to celebrate the launch of Scrypto. |Variable| |[![image\|378x140](upload://6hAyxqvJGUX2PJPyh3e8963rfbq.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radicalstrikers/256/2)|[**RadicalStriker's Genesis Rifles**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radicalstrikers/256/2)|The first game with collectible and tradable items powered by Radix DLT.|100 XRD| |[![image\|690x307, 50%](upload://gNnew4UqjhMfyLq1eeHeU7V2DhR.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/caviarnine/257/2)|[**CaviarNine**](https://radixtalk.com/t/caviarnine/257/2)|The first NFTs to be on-chain on the Radix ledger!|Currently not for sale| |[![image\|498x500, 50%](upload://sjzIx5Xm7Ag5z4Cw4E9aF3ALx4h.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/scrypto-punks/258/2)|[**Scrypto Punks**](https://radixtalk.com/t/scrypto-punks/258/2)|The 1st ever Punks-inspired NFT collection on Radix! |50 XRD| |[![image\|336x336, 74%](upload://17n4Ya6CJopIis3dC5X31y3MDdS.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/natty-radishes/259/2)|[**Natty Radishes**](https://radixtalk.com/t/natty-radishes/259/2)|Collection of 4096 radish NFTs|22 XRD| |[![image\|480x480, 52%](upload://9pDD2Q9tQSXZ4io6U5khFLl6HpU.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/enter-the-radtrix/260/2)|[**Enter the Radtrix**](https://radixtalk.com/t/enter-the-radtrix/260/2)|Pick your favorite Lambo NFT!|From 10 to 80 XRD| |[![image\|399x399, 62%](upload://ttwogJEj8Z6VMHrAfJOGC69zAEY.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/the-shekel-project/261/2)|[**The Shekel Project**](https://radixtalk.com/t/the-shekel-project/261/2)|The Early Mesopotamian $SHKL on Radix DLT.|N/A| |[![image\|515x500, 50%](upload://cbBVZY5YUfiFWdDRLTivqp87lpx.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-collection/262/2)|[**Radix Collection**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-collection/262/2)|7 avatar series to be released before Babylon, each with 5 to 7 characters. 200 NFTs for each character.|220 XRD or 2000 RADC| |[![image\|400x400, 62%](upload://moeJCDUR6frClJHsQeFDxZqs0PT.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/xrdglory/263/2)|[**xrdGlory**](https://radixtalk.com/t/xrdglory/263/2)|How high do you think the price of XRD will go? A new kind of NFT project that depends on the price of XRD.|Variable| |[![image\|500x500, 50%](upload://xaxWtqradlrW5CH3VAeRBoiyqtH.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/root-materials/264/2)|[**Root Materials**](https://radixtalk.com/t/root-materials/264/2)|Root Materials is a collection of 200 unique 3D renders of the Radix symbol inspired by the first ever Radix NFT.|250 XRD| |[![image\|612x202, 40%](upload://kgFDepASBnc51I0hvdmCgLUkCAV.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/badix-universe/265/2)|[**Badix Universe**](https://radixtalk.com/t/badix-universe/265/2)|A virtual economy/universe simulation game on the Radix ledger dedicated to providing NFTs with utility-based value.|50 XRD| |[![E46e2TX\|500x500](upload://utYzY3kdl5zEO4yOeNom097dYGx.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/ratix/292)|[**Ratix**](https://radixtalk.com/t/ratix/292)|NFT art collection of 10,000 unique Rats coming to live exclusively on the Radix network. All original artwork has been created from scratch and with love.| 50 XRD |[![RadLads\|526x500, 50%](upload://jJ8nKonJ0z1x9HC56fuATyIeOIp.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radlads-nft/266/2)|[**RadLads**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radlads-nft/266/2)|RadLads is a collection of 10,000 Radical Lads on the Radix network.|25 XRD or 20 OCI| |[![image\|500x500](upload://9hWdVB8WNtcBbFnaz3g0HQSr1NE.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/sons-of-heaven/273)|[**Sons of Heaven**](https://radixtalk.com/t/sons-of-heaven/273)|5,020 Sons of Heaven follow the Emperor's Call in one of these ranks: Infantry, Cavalry, Officer, the Royal Assassin or the Imperial Family itself.| 250 XRD| |[![image\|360x360](upload://lf2ZKTEqrQU6U8GOQNBwBK5W4cn.png)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radogs-nfts/275)|[**Radogs**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radogs-nfts/275)|The loyal friend of Radix. Fully integrated with the Radix wallet. Automated reservation system. No manual processing. Only 10.000 Radogs created. There is a companion for everyone!| 25 XRD |[![image\|480x480](upload://m5tNrGCER0XWNxu6S3lbUUDCyHF.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radapes/277)|[**RadApes**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radapes/277)|First and coolest apes on Radix! RadApes is an NFT series featuring 10,000 AI-generated apes.| 50 XRD |[![image\|500x500](upload://2ef6FnjsMbScWhUBzb1L74uJ9wy.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radthings/279)|[**RadThings**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radthings/279)|Radthings live in the Radiverse of Radix DLT. 10,000 original NFTs inspired by the Radix community which can be reserved now in advance of Radix Babylon release.| 20 to 30 XRD |[![radixlist\|500x500](upload://5ZsdvU7QFZh62papI5LsxXjuXr3.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radical-penguins/281)|[**Radical Penguins**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radical-penguins/281)|The Radical Penguins colony is the first Penguins and 3D next level NFT art Radix!|175 XRD| |[![image\|500x500](upload://qaFGgDR2J9LG6BWkZP3LQiAIBky.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-ratz/286)|[**Radix Ratz**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-ratz/286)|High quality illustrations of different Ratz, ranging from the Radix Team to crypto names like Michael Saylor. | 50 XRD |[![image\|500x500](upload://4mZy5GVqP5aW5HnYwE6SblhRLtC.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radixville-homes/288)|[**Radixville HOMEs**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radixville-homes/288)|10,100 unique evolving artworks of HOMEs on Radixville.| 40 XRD |[![AmazedRetroTechzillas\|250x250](upload://kZiCF591O3rqiFvySRiHYebi2xI.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/amazed-retro-techzillas/299)|[**Amazed Retro Techzillas**](https://radixtalk.com/t/amazed-retro-techzillas/299)|Pixelart. Collection of 10 000 unique NFTs. Amazed Retro Techzilla is the official mascot of the ART token.| 100 XRD |[![video\|500x500](upload://lTvqz1EyrePCCyxj6HKSBrnEXzh.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/spike-bros/307)|[**Spike Bros**](https://radixtalk.com/t/spike-bros/307)|Spike Bros is an art NFT consisting of 10000 randomly generated space cacti.| 40 XRD or equivalent in DGC| |[![photo_2022-01-31_15-35-25\|500x500](upload://pgO2XMktBLf6NzKAzGlAKOcTaZv.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/alpha-radish-nft-series/311)|[**Alpha Radish**](https://radixtalk.com/t/alpha-radish-nft-series/311)|A 10,000 unique Radishes designed to act as a “keycard” for holders and collectors to unlock special features on the Radish Platform that will be built on the RADIX DLT.| To be announced| |[![image\|500x500](upload://stclbf3kPMLXBCFqR5xhf3eApbv.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/roidboiz/313)|[**Roidboiz**](https://radixtalk.com/t/roidboiz/313)|9,936 unique Roidboiz NFTs occupying the farthest shards of the Radix Shardspace.|PRESALE: 100XRD / 200,000DGC |[![dachshunds-preview\|320x320](upload://yfwZ3eL79jUBZpoRxBdMi2KRQPG.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/dapper-dachshunds/317)|[**Dapper Dachshunds**](https://radixtalk.com/t/dapper-dachshunds/317)|A collection of 10,000 unique pixel art dachshund NFTs.| 35 XRD |[![image\|500x500](upload://84JTIOtJJJsOtFYuOKBcTBCO7H5.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-panda/398)|[**Radix Panda**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radix-panda/398)|10 000 unique Panda NFTs have found their way onto the Radix DLT. Each of them has distinctive features that distinguish them from the rest. Truth be told, they are all adorable!| 20 XRD |[![image\|500x500](upload://7J4DaceeM2xe3RMfCYQ0vvEVJQ7.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radical-robos/412)|[**Radical ROBOS**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radical-robos/412)|5,000 unique Robo NFTs on Radix.|100 XRD |[![image\|500x500](upload://fAque1suC8A4cI4PxIe6I2ul6NW.jpeg)](https://radixtalk.com/t/egx-2022/466)|[**Egx 2022**](https://radixtalk.com/t/egx-2022/466)|Egx 2022 - A festive NFT collection of 2022 randomly generated Easter Eggs for #RadixMaxis & #RadixHodlers | 20 XRD |[![radheads\|100%](upload://sMxwsIb5u33b8McUuETFKfU5igk.gif)](https://radixtalk.com/t/radheads/469)|[**RadHeads**](https://radixtalk.com/t/radheads/469)|RadHeads is a 3D #FT collection of 10,000 unique heads designed to represent the #Radix community!|20 XRD

item.title: List of NFTs on Radix DLT
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Summary list of NFTs on the Radix Ledger

NFT Preview Name Brief description Price
NerdsRepublic Nerds Republic is the first collection of 10,000 unique characters living on the Radix DLT. 150 XRD
Abandoned Scorpions A collection of 10,000 unique pixelart scorpions living on the Radix DLT. 20 XRD
HOARD The collection consists of 10,000 unique Hoard Coins influenced by several historical eras. 25 XRD
Artistizen 25 Radix Team Tributjects in 100 sets to celebrate the launch of Scrypto. Variable
RadicalStriker’s Genesis Rifles The first game with collectible and tradable items powered by Radix DLT. 100 XRD
CaviarNine The first NFTs to be on-chain on the Radix ledger! Currently not for sale
Scrypto Punks The 1st ever Punks-inspired NFT collection on Radix! 50 XRD
Natty Radishes Collection of 4096 radish NFTs 22 XRD
Enter the Radtrix Pick your favorite Lambo NFT! From 10 to 80 XRD
The Shekel Project The Early Mesopotamian $SHKL on Radix DLT. N/A
Radix Collection 7 avatar series to be released before Babylon, each with 5 to 7 characters. 200 NFTs for each character. 220 XRD or 2000 RADC
xrdGlory How high do you think the price of XRD will go? A new kind of NFT project that depends on the price of XRD. Variable
Root Materials Root Materials is a collection of 200 unique 3D renders of the Radix symbol inspired by the first ever Radix NFT. 250 XRD
Badix Universe A virtual economy/universe simulation game on the Radix ledger dedicated to providing NFTs with utility-based value. 50 XRD
Ratix NFT art collection of 10,000 unique Rats coming to live exclusively on the Radix network. All original artwork has been created from scratch and with love. 50 XRD
RadLads RadLads is a collection of 10,000 Radical Lads on the Radix network. 25 XRD or 20 OCI
Sons of Heaven 5,020 Sons of Heaven follow the Emperor’s Call in one of these ranks: Infantry, Cavalry, Officer, the Royal Assassin or the Imperial Family itself. 250 XRD
Radogs The loyal friend of Radix. Fully integrated with the Radix wallet. Automated reservation system. No manual processing. Only 10.000 Radogs created. There is a companion for everyone! 25 XRD
RadApes First and coolest apes on Radix! RadApes is an NFT series featuring 10,000 AI-generated apes. 50 XRD
RadThings Radthings live in the Radiverse of Radix DLT. 10,000 original NFTs inspired by the Radix community which can be reserved now in advance of Radix Babylon release. 20 to 30 XRD
Radical Penguins The Radical Penguins colony is the first Penguins and 3D next level NFT art Radix! 175 XRD
Radix Ratz High quality illustrations of different Ratz, ranging from the Radix Team to crypto names like Michael Saylor. 50 XRD
Radixville HOMEs 10,100 unique evolving artworks of HOMEs on Radixville. 40 XRD
Amazed Retro Techzillas Pixelart. Collection of 10 000 unique NFTs. Amazed Retro Techzilla is the official mascot of the ART token. 100 XRD
Spike Bros Spike Bros is an art NFT consisting of 10000 randomly generated space cacti. 40 XRD or equivalent in DGC
Alpha Radish A 10,000 unique Radishes designed to act as a “keycard” for holders and collectors to unlock special features on the Radish Platform that will be built on the RADIX DLT. To be announced
Roidboiz 9,936 unique Roidboiz NFTs occupying the farthest shards of the Radix Shardspace. PRESALE: 100XRD / 200,000DGC
Dapper Dachshunds A collection of 10,000 unique pixel art dachshund NFTs. 35 XRD
Radix Panda 10 000 unique Panda NFTs have found their way onto the Radix DLT. Each of them has distinctive features that distinguish them from the rest. Truth be told, they are all adorable! 20 XRD
Radical ROBOS 5,000 unique Robo NFTs on Radix. 100 XRD
Egx 2022 Egx 2022 - A festive NFT collection of 2022 randomly generated Easter Eggs for #RadixMaxis & #RadixHodlers 20 XRD
RadHeads RadHeads is a 3D #FT collection of 10,000 unique heads designed to represent the #Radix community! 20 XRD

Read full topic
item.source: List of NFTs on Radix DLT
